name: CSPerson
desc: An object representing a person in the context of search results.

items.name: init(displayName: String?, handles: [String], handleIdentifier: String)
items.desc: Returns a new CSPerson object initialized with the specified display name and contact attributes.

items.name: var contactIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The identifier for the contact associated with the person.

items.name: var displayName: String?
items.desc: A display name for the person.

items.name: var handleIdentifier: String
items.desc: A key that identifies the type of contact property represented by the person objectâ€™s handle.

items.name: var handles: [String]
items.desc: An array of contact handles related to the person.
